overview: It's Sarah's wedding day. She's dreamed about getting married, but she can't help to feel that something is amiss. Daisy is moving in with the sexiest couple in town; Celeste Star and Raven Bay. One night, Daisy sneaks around to hear Celeste and Raven have sex. Kiara Mia and Nina Mercedez go at it in the bar, and Nina teaches Kiara a valuable lesson. It's Shyla's birthday and she wants some cock. She decides to masturbate to some hetero porn. When her girlfriend Dani catches her, she's appalled. Spencer Scott may be the biggest bitch one could have for a boss, but she's no slouch! When she catches her employee Vanessa Veracruz badmouthing her at work one day, Spencer decides to make Vanessa her bitch!
title: Hot and Mean 8
